title: Net profits/loss of Italian company Dolce & Gabbana in 2014 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Net profits/loss in million euros, containing a total of 5 data points.
Overall Net profits/loss in million euros has increased over the Year.
Net profits/loss in million euros is roughly constant from 2014 to 2016, gradually increasing from 2016 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
The line drastically remained stable by 5.6 times from Year 2015 to 2016, and lastly, increased by 7.4 times from Year 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Net profits/loss in million euros, of value 27.55 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest Net profits/loss in million euros, of value 3.73 was reported at Year 2016

max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Net profits/loss in million euros, containing a total of 5 data points.
In general Net profits/loss in million euros has rose over the Year.
Net profits/loss in million euros is roughly constant from 2014 to 2016, gradually increasing from 2016 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Net profits/loss in million euros, of value 27.55 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest Net profits/loss in million euros, of value 3.73 was reported at Year 2016
The line significantly remained stable by 17.16 from Year 2015 to 2016, and lastly, increased by 23.82 from Year 2016 to 2017.
